## Tiller Sheath Blight Severity Model
```{r}
TShB_lmm_2015 <- lmer(TShB_AUDPS ~ WMGT * NRTE + (1 | REP/WMGT),
                      data = AUDPS_2015,
                      REML = FALSE)
summary(TShB_lmm_2015, correlation = FALSE)

plot(TShB_lmm_2015)
qqnorm(resid(TShB_lmm_2015))

```
